metadata.name: Potential Tampering With Security Products Via WMIC
metadata.comment: Detects uninstallation or termination of security products using the WMIC utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wmic')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('product where ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('call')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('uninstall')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/nointeractive')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wmic')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('caption like ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('call delete')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('call terminate'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('process ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('where ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('delete'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%carbon%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%cylance%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%endpoint%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%eset%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%malware%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%sophos%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%symantec%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('antivirus')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('avg ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('carbon black')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('carbonblack')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cb defense sensor 64-bit')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('crowdstrike sensor')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cylance ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dell threat defense')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dlp endpoint')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('endpoint detection')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('endpoint protection')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('endpoint security')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('endpoint sensor')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('eset file security')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('logrhythm system monitor service')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('malwarebytes')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mcafee agent')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('microsoft security client')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sophos anti-virus')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sophos autoupdate')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sophos credential store')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sophos management console')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sophos management database')) OR update manager')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('threat protection')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('virusscan')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('webroot secureanywhere')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('windows defender'))))
